bibl.title: PVindob. Gr. 24951 + 24556: New Evidence for Tax Exempt Status in Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Two fragments, one of which was published as S.P.P. XXII, 93. Tax collector's synopsis, record of people who have either died or turned 14, and the consequent adjustments. Socnopaiou Nesos, 178/9 A.D.

bibl.title: Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 24556 + 24951 145.4 S.P.P. XXII, 93
Hobson Deborah W., PVindob. Gr. 24951 + 24556: New Evidence for Tax Exempt Status in Roman Egypt.
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III (Napoli, 1984) pp. 847-864, 1 pl.

Two fragments, one of which was published as S.P.P. XXII, 93. Tax collector's synopsis, record of people who have either died or turned 14, and the consequent adjustments. Socnopaiou Nesos, 178/9 A.D.
